p: Within the 219 articles coded a trend in publishing was observed over the last decade with increasing numbers of articles either focussing on, or mentioning, cognition, sensemaking or managerial interpretation. During this ten year period article numbers have grown from around five articles per year to over forty such articles being published on the topics in 2019. Journal of Business Ethics; Journal of Cleaner Production; and, Business Strategy and the Environment have consistently been the main journals publishing on the topics over the period examined. Details of this analysis are presented within Fig.Â 1 below. Further, the vast majority of the articles published have been empirical with only 18% theoretical in nature.
